lines.text: printf "%s" "$body" | jq -e '(.ok==true) or (has("schema")) or (has("schemaVersion")) or (has("schema_version") and has("metadata"))' >/dev/null || fail "debug-bundle missing ok/schema/schemaVersion/schema_version+metadata for $url"
printf "%s" "$body" | jq -e 'has("meta") or has("schemaVersion")' >/dev/null || fail "legacy envelope missing meta/schemaVersion for $url"
printf "%s" "$body" | jq -e '(has("schemaVersion") and has("blockId") and has("meta") and has("data"))' >/dev/null || fail "v3-flat missing schemaVersion/blockId/meta/data for $url"
printf "%s" "$body" | grep -Eq '"schemaVersion"[[:space:]]*:' || fail "v3-flat missing schemaVersion for $url"
printf "%s" "$body" | grep -Eq '"meta"[[:space:]]*:|"schemaVersion"[[:space:]]*:' || fail "legacy missing meta/schemaVersion for $url"
sample_values: ok ? { date: bar.date, close: bar.close, volume: bar.volume } : null
if (!history || typeof history !== "object") return { schemaVersion: "1.0.0", items: [] };
if (raw && typeof raw === "object" && raw.schemaVersion && raw.mirrorId && raw.items) {
const dataQuality = normalizeDataQuality(meta.status || legacy.dataQuality || (legacy.ok === false ? "ERROR" : null));
elif (.meta.status|type)!="string" then err("meta.status is not string")
elif (.ok==false and .meta.status!="error") then err("ok=false but meta.status is not error")
elif (.meta.status|type)!="string" then err("meta.status is not string")
elif (.ok==false and .meta.status!="error") then err("ok=false but meta.status is not error")
elif ((.meta.status|ascii_downcase)=="fresh" or (.meta.status|ascii_downcase)=="live") then err("meta.status should not be fresh/live")
assert(payload.meta.status === "fresh", "okEnvelope default status should be fresh");
curl -fsS "$PREVIEW/api/price-snapshot?debug=1" | jq '{feature, ok, hasMeta:(.meta!=null), metaStatus:(.meta.status//null), metaReason:(.meta.reason//null)}'
curl -fsS "$PREVIEW/api/alpha-radar?debug=1" | jq '{feature, ok, hasMeta:(.meta!=null), metaStatus:(.meta.status//null), metaReason:(.meta.reason//null)}'
